flawed_nl_solution:
65% of the library books are for adults because 100 - 35 = <<100-35=65>>65
There are 106.0 library books in total because 104 / 0.65 = <<104/0.65=106.0>>106.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160.0, not 106.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
